item.title: Terraform Best Practices
item.description: Essentials Use remote state and state locking Agree on naming convention Use tags As a common sense, it’s highly recommended to reuse some matured modules such as VPC https://registry.terraform.io/ Keep your providers, modules versioned properly Keep each module in a separate repo. Usually it depends on project size, and we can use monorepo or single modules repo as well. Use pre-commit https://pre-commit.com/#install https://github.com/antonbabenko/pre-commit-terraform Must have hooks:
